Name: Red Angel 'Martini'
Ingredients: 30 ml Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur
15 ml Chilled water omit if using wet ice
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: A subtly flavoured cocktail with a dry, almost tannic edge.
History: Created in 2001 by Tony Conigliaro at Isola, Knightsbridge, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Red Angel 'Martini' contains 143 calories
